items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Beautiful dress! Great quality. The dark green color was perfect for my daughter‚Äôs event. She wore it to a school Christmas function. Very comfortable and received many compliments on it. If this helps, she‚Äôs 5‚Äô6‚Äù and 125lbs and the XS fit just perfect! Read more
items.author: FancyNancy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: I love this dress, it makes me feel beautiful. I‚Äôm short and curvy, I wear a size 14 but after reading reviews, I decided to go with the 16 in the plus size, solely to make sure it fit across my bust well. I made the right decision. The 16 fits around the girls just perfectly. It‚Äôs a little big in the waist but it hangs very nicely and is flattering. The fabric is nice. The dress is made well. Read more
items.author: MJohnsonAZ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and Comfortable!
items.body: I love it. The burnt orange is a beautiful fall color, the dress fits well, is super forgiving in the tummy area and I am a curvy girl with hips and a juicy butt. I'm a 34F, and the snap does pull a smidgen depending on how I move, but what's really weird is that when my shoulders are back and the dress is positioned properly on my shoulders, it does not. I bought it for our fall family photo shoot, but loved it so much that I am wearing it today at work. Adorable with cowboy boots and sassy jewelry! Read more
items.author: JyngerM.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful holiday dress
items.body: Beautiful color. Material is soft & flowy. Flattering but runs a little big Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent dress choice for maternity
items.body: Great dress. Worn it several times now while Very pregnant (8 months), and I love it. I feel pretty wearing it, unlike trying to wear nearly anything else right now. Being a true wrap it also is wearable still when my size slims again. Not just a one and done. Good feeling material, pretty thick but survivable in even Texas October heat. Vibrant color...just much a good dress. Read more
items.author: Lillian Yount

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor design choices, not too bad
items.body: It‚Äôs an ok dress. The material is thin. Looks nice on, wrap dresses look good on most body types. I don‚Äôt like that there is a little silver clasp/button on the neckline to keep the top more modest. You can see it if you don‚Äôt clasp it which is unfortunate, they should have used a black clasp/button for that. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2‚Äù so it‚Äôs definitely longer on me than the model, but I wore heels with it so it‚Äôs fine. Oh, the velvet feels smooth when you rub up the fabric and not down; whoever cut it up and sewed it together didn‚Äôt think that through. Read more
items.author: Criselle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super trendy wrap dress
items.body: This dress is so classy and cute. The velvet adds a fun detail and I love the short sleeves along with the slit in the leg. The dress is a wrap so it is very adjustable to your body and is perfect for fall or spring weddings. The material is thick and stretchy which makes the dress very comfortable. There are a bunch of different colors to chose from. Read more
items.author: Bridget

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress!
items.body: Wore this dress to a wedding and absolutely loved it! It was extremely comfortable, the fabric felt great, and the fit was super flattering. It‚Äôs a true wrap style, and there‚Äôs a small inner tie that keeps it from opening too far, so make sure you find it and tie it so the dress stays perfectly in place. üòÖ No ironing was needed, which was a huge plus! I actually ordered three options from a well-known women‚Äôs dress company and sent them all back for this one. I‚Äôm 5'4" and 105 lbs and an XS was perfect. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Summers

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi Cocktail Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi Cocktail Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Maxi Cocktail Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Light Blue, Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Purple, Velvet-Floral Velvet-Short Sleeve Y-velvet-floral Print-green(faux Wrap), Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Wine Red, Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Champagne, Plus Size-Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Plus Mauve, Plus Size-Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Plus Size Emerald Green, Plus Size-Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Plus Dark Rose, Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Cherry, Plus Size-Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Plus Light Blue, Plus Size-Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Plus Purple, Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Dark Rose, Plus Size-Velvet-Short Sleeve Z-velvet Plus Black, Plus Size-Velvet-Long Sleeve Z-velvet Plus-long Sleeve Black(faux Wrap). If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
